alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 17 at 8:33PM EST until January 18 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST TUESDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IS CANCELLED... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Up to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Soundside areas along the Pamlico Sound, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Up to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in a low threat of property damage. Minor ocean overwash possible overnight on portion of Hwy 12. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Coast Guard Hatteras NC MLLW Categories - Minor 2.5 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 4.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/10 PM 2.9 1.7 2.7 4 Minor 18/07 PM 1.4 0.2 1.0 1 None 19/08 AM 1.6 0.4 0.8 1 None 19/08 PM 1.3 0.1 0.8 2 None 20/10 AM 1.7 0.5 0.9 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
